name: The World of Leona BETA
description: The World of Leona is a platform/adventure game based in classics of video games such as Megaman and Ghouls'n Ghosts. Made in PixelArt, The World of Leona is a good challenge to those who love games. You live as Leona, a fox-half-human in her search to save the world of the evil. You can jump, fire, transform in this world full of secrets and challenges.
